body: Re-suspend cell pellets at 4 °C in 80 µL of lysis buffer, containing 50 mM NaH<sub>2</sub>PO<sub>4</sub> at pH 8 with 300 mM NaCl, 20 mM imidazole, CelLytic B \(Sigma), Lysozyme \(1 mg/mL), Benzonase \(50 units/mL), proteinase inhibitor cocktail \(Sigma), and PMSF \(1 mM/mL).
Wash Ni-NTA Superflow \(QIAGEN) twice with water and twice with 50 mM NaH<sub>2</sub>PO<sub>4</sub> at pH 8 with 300 mM NaCl, 20 mM imidazole using centrifugation.
Add 25 μL pre-washed Ni-NTA Superflow \(QIAGEN) to each well
Transfer the mixtures into bottom-sealed filter plates \(Multiscreen Nylon Mesh)
Incubated for 1.5 hr at 4 °C with vigorously shaking
